trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Molloy
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along the Mulligan Highway just after dusk and I saw a bright red light that appeared from no where (above the trees on the left hand side of the road) It hovered for like 10 seconds and it landed then disappeared into thin air and left no trace. Very strange!!
Summary: Driving along the Mulligan highway and light appeared.
